title: NCLT rejects JM Financial Asset Reconstruction's plea in Arch Pharmalabs case...
description: The National Company Law Tribunal dismissed JM Financial Asset Reconstruction's application to intervene in an insolvency resolution application filed by Bank of Baroda against Arch Pharmalabs.
content: (You can now subscribe to our Economic Times WhatsApp channel)
